introEmbed.title: Welcome to Invite Rewards!
introEmbed.description: Thank you for adding Invite Rewards to your server! ðŸŽ‰ This bot helps you track and reward members for inviting others to your server. Let's get started!

fields.name: Step 1: Setup a welcome channel
fields.value: Use `/welcome channel set` and `/welcome message set-server` to configure a welcome message for your server. It's quick and easy!

fields.name: Step 2: Add Rewards
fields.value: Set up custom rewards for invites using `/rewards add-reward`. Members will love earning prizes!

fields.name: Need Help?
fields.value: Check out `/help` for a full list of commands and guidance.

invalidSubcommand.title: Invalid subcommand
invalidSubcommand.description: The subcommand you provided is invalid. Please check the /help command for more information.

errorWhileExecutingCommand.title: Error while executing command
errorWhileExecutingCommand.description: An error occurred while executing the command. Please try again later.

noUserProvided.title: User Not Provided
noUserProvided.description: Please provide a valid user to get history for.

botNotFound.title: Bot Not Found
botNotFound.description: I couldn't find myself in the server.

invalidJson.title: Invalid JSON
invalidJson.description: The JSON you provided is invalid.

embedTooLong.title: Embed Too Long
embedTooLong.description: The embed you provided is too long. Please shorten it and try again.

serverCommand.title: Server Command
serverCommand.description: This command can only be used in a server.

noGroupDm.title: Group DM
noGroupDm.description: This command can't be used in group DMs.

textChannelOnly.title: Text Channel Only
textChannelOnly.description: This command can only be used in text channels.

interactionTimedOut.title: Interaction Timed Out
interactionTimedOut.description: You took too long to respond. Please try again.

interactionProcessError.title: Interaction Process Error
interactionProcessError.description: An error occurred while processing the interaction. Please try again.

additionalFields.name: Feedback
additionalFields.value: If you have any feedback, want to report a bug or suggest a new feature, please use the /feedback command. Your feedback is greatly appreciated!

additionalFields.name: Invite Me
additionalFields.value: [Click to invite me to your server!]({botInviteLink})

inviteManagement.name: /bonus invites add
inviteManagement.description: Add bonus invites to a user.

inviteManagement.name: /bonus invites remove
inviteManagement.description: Remove bonus invites from a user.

inviteManagement.name: /inviter
inviteManagement.description: Find out who invited a user.

inviteManagement.name: /invites
inviteManagement.description: Get the total invites of a user.

inviteManagement.name: /invited-list
inviteManagement.description: View all the users invited by a user.

inviteManagement.name: /who-used
inviteManagement.description: Find out who used an invite link.

inviteManagement.name: /history
inviteManagement.description: View the join and leave history of a user.

language.name: /language set
language.description: Set the language for the bot.

leaderboards.name: /leaderboard daily
leaderboards.description: View the daily leaderboard, or create an auto-updating one.

leaderboards.name: /leaderboard weekly
leaderboards.description: View the weekly leaderboard, or create an auto-updating one.

leaderboards.name: /leaderboard monthly
leaderboards.description: View the monthly leaderboard, or create an auto-updating one.

leaderboards.name: /leaderboard all-time
leaderboards.description: View the all-time leaderboard, or create an auto-updating one.

verification.name: /verification setup simple
verification.description: Set up simple verification in your server.

verification.name: /verification setup question
verification.description: Set up question verification in your server.

verification.name: /verification setup pin
verification.description: Set up pin verification in your server.

welcomer.name: /farewell channel set
welcomer.description: Set the farewell channel in the server.

welcomer.description: Remove the farewell channel.

welcomer.description: Set the farewell message for the server channel.

welcomer.description: Remove the server farewell message.

miscellaneous.name: /feedback
miscellaneous.description: Send feedback or suggest new features to the bot developer.

miscellaneous.name: /invite
miscellaneous.description: Invite the bot to your server.

miscellaneous.name: /placeholders
miscellaneous.description: View all the placeholders you can use in invite messages and embeds.

miscellaneous.name: /vote
miscellaneous.description: Vote for the bot on top.gg.

success.title: Invite the bot
success.description: Click the buttons below to invite the bot to your server or visit our website!

success.title: Vote for the bot
success.description: Click the button below to vote for the bot on top.gg!

placeholders.username: The username of the invited user
placeholders.user-tag: The tag of the invited user
placeholders.member-count: The total member count of the server
placeholders.inviter-count: The total invite count of the inviter
placeholders.inviter-real-count: The real invite count of the inviter
placeholders.inviter-fake-count: The fake invite count of the inviter

embed.title: Placeholders
embed.description:
Here are the placeholders you can use in invite messages and embeds: 
 {placeholders}

voteLocked.title: Vote Locked Command
voteLocked.description: You have to vote for the bot before you can use this command.

guildOnly.title: Guild Only Command
guildOnly.description: This command can only be used in a server.

invalidLanguage.title: Invalid language
invalidLanguage.description: The language you provided is invalid.

success.title: Language set
success.description: The language has been set to {language}.

success.title: Current language
success.description: The current language is {language}.

add.title: Success
add.description: Added {amount} bonus invites to {user}. They now have {total} invites in total.

remove.title: Success
remove.description: Removed {amount} bonus invites from {user}. They now have {total} invites in total.

noHistory.title: No History Found
noHistory.description: No join or leave history found for {user}.

success.title: Join and Leave History
success.description: History for {user}:

noUserProvided.title: User Not Provided
noUserProvided.description: Please provide a valid user to check the invites for.

success.title: Invited Users List
success.description:
Users invited by {user}:
 {invitedUsers}

noUserProvided.title: User Not Provided
noUserProvided.description: Please provide a valid user to check the inviter for.

noInviterFound.title: No Inviter Found
noInviterFound.description: I couldn't find an inviter for the specified user.

inviterUnresolved.title: Inviter Could Not Be Resolved
inviterUnresolved.description: I was unable to resolve the inviter for the specified user.

success.title: User Inviter
success.description: The inviter for {user} is {inviter}.

breakdown.title: Invite Breakdown for {user}

noLink.title: No Link Provided
noLink.description: Please provide a valid invite link to check who used it.

noUsers.title: No Users Found
noUsers.description: No users found who used the invite link.

success.title: Users Who Used Invite
success.description:
Users who used the invite code {link}:
{users}

invalidChannelType.title: Invalid Channel Type
invalidChannelType.description: The channel you provided is not a text channel.

roleNotFoundError.title: :x:  Role not found
roleNotFoundError.description: The role you provided was not found in this server.

managedRoleAssignError.title: :x:  Managed role
managedRoleAssignError.description: I can't assign or remove the role {role} because it is managed by an integration.

hierarchyRoleAssignError.title: :x:  Missing Permissions
hierarchyRoleAssignError.description: I can't assign or remove the role {role} because it is higher than my highest role. Please move my role above the role you want me to manage.

noPermissions.title: :x:  Missing Permissions
noPermissions.description: I don't have the necessary permissions to manage the role {role}.

noRolesProvided.title: Roles Not Provided
noRolesProvided.description: Please provide at least 1 valid role.

success.title: Reaction Roles Created
success.description: The reaction roles have been created.

roleNoLongerExists.title: Role No Longer Exists
roleNoLongerExists.description: This reaction role no longer exists in this server.

roleRemoved.title: Success
roleRemoved.description: The reaction role {role} has been removed from you.

roleAssigned.title: Success
roleAssigned.description: The reaction role {role} has been assigned to you.

error.title: Error
error.description: An error occurred while assigning the reaction role. Please try again later.

creatingGiveaway.title: ...Creating Giveaway
creatingGiveaway.description: Please wait while I create the giveaway.

invalidNumberOfWinners.title: Invalid Number of Winners
invalidNumberOfWinners.description: The number of winners must be between 1 and 10.

giveawayNotFound.title: Giveaway Not Found
giveawayNotFound.description: The giveaway with the ID {giveawayId} was not found.

giveawayDeleted.title: Giveaway Deleted
giveawayDeleted.description: The giveaway with the ID {giveawayId} has been deleted.

giveawayAlreadyEnded.title: Giveaway Already Ended
giveawayAlreadyEnded.description: The giveaway with the ID {giveawayId} has already ended.

giveawayRerolled.title: Giveaway Rerolled
giveawayRerolled.description: The giveaway with the ID {giveawayId} has been rerolled.

giveawayEndedReply.title: Giveaway Ended
giveawayEndedReply.description: The giveaway with the ID {giveawayId} has been ended.

giveawayStillActive.title: Giveaway Still Active
giveawayStillActive.description: The giveaway with the ID {giveawayId} is still active. Consider ending it with /giveaway end {giveawayId}.

giveawayWon.title: Giveaway Ended!
giveawayWon.description: {mentionWinners} Congratulations! You won the giveaway for **{prize}**!

giveawayRerolledWon.title: Giveaway Rerolled!
giveawayRerolledWon.description: {mentionWinners} Congratulations! You won the rerolled giveaway for **{prize}**!

alreadyAutoRoleWarning.title: :x:  Already an auto role
alreadyAutoRoleWarning.description: The role {role} is already an auto role.

maxAutoRolesError.title: :x:  Max auto roles
maxAutoRolesError.description: You have reached the maximum number of auto roles. Please remove an auto role before adding a new one.

success.title: :white_check_mark:  Auto role added
success.description: The role {role} has been added as an auto role.

notAutoRoleError.title: :x:  Not an auto role
notAutoRoleError.description: The role {role} is not an auto role.

success.title: :white_check_mark:  Auto role removed
success.description: The role {role} has been removed as an auto role.

success.title: Auto roles
success.description: The auto roles for this server are:

noManageRolesPermissionError.title: :x:  Missing Permissions
noManageRolesPermissionError.description: I attempted to assign an auto role to a new member, but was unable to do so because I don't have the "Manage Roles" permission. Please ensure that I have the necessary permissions to manage roles in your server settings.
noManageRolesPermissionError.dmDescription: :wave: I attempted to assign an auto role to a new member in {serverName}, but was unable to do so because I don't have the "Manage Roles" permission. Please ensure that I have the necessary permissions to manage roles in your server settings.

hierarchyRoleAssignError.title: :x:  Missing Permissions
hierarchyRoleAssignError.description: I attempted to assign an auto role to a new member, but was unable to do so because the role I was trying to assign is higher than my highest role. Please move my role above every role you want me to manage.
hierarchyRoleAssignError.dmDescription: :wave: I attempted to assign an auto role to a new member in {serverName}, but was unable to do so because the role I was trying to assign is higher than my highest role. Please move my role above every role you want me to manage.

noQuestionAnswer.title: No Question or Answer Provided
noQuestionAnswer.description: Please provide a question and answer to set up quetion verification.

success.title: Verification Setup
success.description: Verification has been set up in channel {channel}. Members will receive the {role} role after verifying.

success.title: Verification Disabled
success.description: Verification has been disabled in this server.

invalidConfig.title: Invalid Configuration
invalidConfig.description: The verification configuration is invalid. Please check the configuration and try again.

incorrectAnswer.title: Incorrect Answer
incorrectAnswer.description: You provided an incorrect answer. Please try again.

incorrectPin.title: Incorrect Pin
incorrectPin.description: You provided an incorrect pin. Please try again.

fakeUser.title: Fake User
fakeUser.description: You are flagged as a fake user and cannot be verified.

verificationDisabled.title: Verification Disabled
verificationDisabled.description: Verification is disabled in this server.

missingPermissions.title: Missing Permissions
missingPermissions.description: I don't have the necessary permissions to grant you the verification role.

roleNotFound.title: Role Not Found
roleNotFound.description: The verification role was not found in this server.

managedRole.title: Managed Role
managedRole.description: I can't assign or remove the verification role because it is managed by an integration.

hierarchyError.title: Missing Permissions
hierarchyError.description: I can't assign or remove the verification role because it is higher than my highest role. Please move my role above the role you want me to manage.

unknownType.title: Unknown Type
unknownType.description: The verification type you provided is invalid.

error.title: Error
error.description: An error occurred while verifying you. Please try again later.

success.title: Verified
success.description: You have been verified.

timeout.title: Timeout
timeout.description: You took too long to answer. Please try again.

success.title: Leaderboard
success.description: The leaderboard for this server is:

success.title: Reward Removed
success.description: The reward {rewardName} has been removed.

roleNotRequired.title: Role Not Required
roleNotRequired.description: The role you provided cannot be used for this reward type. Use the `role` reward type instead.

removableNotRequired.title: Removable Not Required
removableNotRequired.description: The removable option you provided cannot be used for this reward type. Use the `role` reward type instead.

storeNotRequired.title: Attachment Not Required
storeNotRequired.description: The attachment you provided cannot be used for this reward type. Use the `Message Store` reward type instead.

alreadyExists.title: Reward Already Exists
alreadyExists.description: A reward with this name already exists.

maxReached.title: Max Rewards
maxReached.description: You have reached the maximum number of rewards. Please remove a reward before adding a new one.

success.title: Role Reward Added
success.description: The role reward {rewardName} for {role} has been added.

roleRequired.title: Role Not Provided

fileEmpty.description: The file you provided is empty or the format is invalid.
